title: Cross-Cultural Competency Development Simulation Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic instructional methodologies and multicultural education concepts
context.additional_context: Training process for intercultural interaction in real classroom settings through VR-based cultural experience simulations.

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate the ability to analyze perspectives of learners from diverse cultural backgrounds.
Learners can resolve cultural conflict scenarios in science classes with 80% accuracy.
Learners achieve a score of 3.5 or higher on a 4-point scale for intercultural sensitivity indicators in formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
